text: Jean-Loup Dabadie (27 September 1938 - 24 May 2020) was a French journalist, writer, lyricist, and screenwriter. He was born in Paris. Dabadie was a member of the Académie française. Dabadie was known for his works in Anna (1967), Such a Gorgeous Kid Like Me (1972), Courage - Let's Run (1979), Clara et les Chics Types (1981) and Get Well Soon (2014). Dabadie died at a Paris hospital on 24 May 2020, aged 81.L'académicien Jean-Loup Dabadie est mort à 81 ans ==References== ==Other websites== * L'Académie française * Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French screenwriters Category:French journalists Category:French songwriters Category:Writers from Paris
title: Jean-Loup Dabadie
